speaker: Hunter's Trail
lines: You follow boot treads through damp mud.
You notice feather tufts snagged on a thorn.
You see an un-sprung snare under a fern.
You pass a tree marked with three notches, one fresh.
A cork dangles from a string; it smells faintly of apple.
You keep your footing under the canopy.
A low growl comes from ahead on the trail.
You sense eyes watching from a blind by the path.

choices.text: Call out to the hunter you cannot see.
Stand your ground and draw steel.
Turn off the trail toward a darker stream.
